title: Kovarex Enrichment | beltbased | tileable
descriptionMarkdown:
# Kovarex Enrichment | beltbased | tileable

## inspiration
I got the closed-loop-system-per-centrifuge idea from [here](ttps://www.reddit.com/r/factorio/comments/69tj6q/super_simple_kovarex_enrichment_setup/)

## description
A vertically and horizontally tileable setup of singular centrifuges that have to be manually started and puts out 1 U235- per centrifuge

## setup instructions
- let blueprint be built
- fill each centrifuge **MANUALLY** with ~50 Kovarex (NOT MORE THAN 80!) You can do this by having multiple stacks of U-235 and running  along the setup whilst holding right mouse and ctrl over the centrifuges.
- hook up the outer 2 belts to be filled with U-238. The center one is for 235 output

## cons
- meant for late game.
- doesn't fuel itself (meaning, if you start up only one centrifuge, only one will continue working)
- you have to manually start it up
- if done wrong, it is prone to clogging and then it stops

## pro's
- tileable both vertically and horizontally
- tileable whilst running

## maybe later
there's a way to add logistics chests to request the startup amount of U- 235 and 238 only for initial startup but I can't be bothered (yet) to figure out the circuitry and where to set up the chests.
